attributes.action: make motorcycles/mopeds have yellow headlights to make them more distinguishable at night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At night it can be very difficult to distinguish what is a car headlight from a motorcycle headlight which can make for very dangerous situations. Pedal cyclists who have red flashing lights are very easy to discern at distance therefore a similar arrangement for motorcyclists, i.e. having yellow headlights, would make them much safer at night.
